heading: 2. (1) In these Regulations “Act of 1930” means the National Monuments
text_raw:
2. (1) In these Regulations “Act of 1930” means the National Monuments 

Act 1930 (No. 2 of 1930). 

(2) A word or expression that is used in these Regulations and that is also 
used in Directive 2011/92/EU of the European Parliament and of the Council of 
13 December 20113 (as amended by Directive 2014/52/EU of the European 
Parliament and of the Council of 16 April 20144) has the same meaning in these 
Regulations as it has in that Directive.
